summary.span: 从中派生 、 和 的 基类。

span.span: The base class from which , , and are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流实例在执行期间会将三种跟踪事件发出到运行时跟踪基础结构：活动状态事件、用户事件和工作流状态事件。During its execution, a workflow instance emits three kinds of tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure: activity status events, user events, and workflow status events. 运行时跟踪基础结构会尝试将这些事件与 中的跟踪点匹配。The runtime tracking infrastructure tries to match these events with track points in a . 匹配了跟踪点后，运行时跟踪基础结构会将包含与跟踪点和跟踪事件均关联的数据的跟踪记录发送到跟踪服务。Whenever the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record that contains data associated with both the track point and the tracking event to the tracking service. 运行时跟踪基础结构可以发送三种跟踪记录：、 和 。There are three kinds of tracking record that the runtime tracking infrastructure can send: an , a , and a . 每种跟踪记录都派生自 类，并与运行时跟踪基础结构可匹配的三种跟踪点之一相对应：、 或 。Each kind of tracking record derives from the class and corresponds to one of the three kinds of track point that the runtime tracking infrastructure can match: an , a , or a .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取与跟踪点关联的批注的集合。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含与此 所对应的跟踪点关联的批注。

span.span: A that contains the annotations associated with the track point to which this corresponds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 中指定要与 、 或 关联的批注。You can specify annotations to be associated with an , a or a in a . 运行时跟踪基础结构将存储这些批注，并在匹配了跟踪点时在 中返回这些批注。The runtime tracking infrastructure stores these annotations, and, when it matches the track point, it returns them in .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取或设置与导致发送跟踪记录的跟踪事件关联的事件数据（如果有）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.

value.span: 一个表示事件数据（如果有）的 ，该事件数据与导致发送跟踪记录的跟踪事件相关联。

span.span: An that represents the event data, if any, that is associated with the tracking event that caused the tracking record to be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流实例发送的某些种类的跟踪事件具有与之关联的事件数据。Certain kinds of tracking events emitted by a workflow instance have event data associated with them. 如果跟踪事件具有与之关联的事件数据，运行时跟踪基础结构会将事件数据放在派生类的 属性中。If a tracking event has event data associated with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure puts the event data in property of the derived class. 例如，当工作流实例终止时，运行时跟踪基础结构会发送 设置为 的 ，其中包含有关终止原因的信息。For example, when a workflow instance is terminated, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a with set to a that contains information about the reason for the termination.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取或设置与跟踪记录关联的跟踪事件的时间和日期。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the time and date of the tracking event associated with the tracking record.

value.span: 一个 ，指示跟踪事件发生时的日期和时间。

span.span: A that indicates the date and time that the tracking event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为协调世界时 (UTC)。The is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取或设置一个值，该值指示与跟踪记录关联的跟踪事件相对于工作流实例发出的其他跟踪事件的顺序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates the order of the tracking event associated with the tracking record relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.

value.span: 一个指示跟踪事件相对于工作流实例发出的其他跟踪事件的顺序的值。

span.span: A value that indicates the order of the tracking event relative to the other tracking events emitted by the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示跟踪事件在工作流实例内的相对顺序。 indicates the relative order of the tracking event within the workflow instance. 在工作流实例内将是唯一的，但不保证是连续的。 will be unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
